text: Ni wa ʋaana ʋolu ɠɛzɛɠɛzɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɔ, wo-ɠɛɛlointi ta wo-lointi ti liai ga tiye duɔlai zu, naati ta gaazumaawɔinɠai zɔlɔɔ ta-luɔ kɛɛɠɛiti zea, naati ta yeeɓe ti ʋa, ti ɠale ma zooi nii zu, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yiimaalaavegɛ ga gaazumaawɔinɠai ta zaalai, ni wa ʋaana pɔ, é la wo laaʋiliga.»
